Title: Product Landing Page
Desc: Crafted a product landing page for the initial release of Stratus Pro, an Gobii 2020 release. On this project, I worked with experienced Backend Developers, UI, and UX teams. During this time, I made React components using async JavaScript, props, and state for search-boxes, login, and registration forms.

Title: Geo-Location API with Node, Express, and MongoDB
Desc: Made a secure backend API with built-in JSON web tokens that stores to a MongoDB database.

Title: Complete Flask Restful API with PostgreSQL DB
Desc: Project to share information about local coffee shops using serialization with marshmallow to convert complex objects into server-side JSON data. Server is secured using JWT authentication, inculding usernames, and hashed passwords with bcrypt.
